entry.title: The Acta Sanctorum Online
entry.content:
Roger Pearse in his excellent blog Thoughts on Antiquity, Patristics, putting things online, freedom of speech, information access, and more, has collected the open access manifestations of the Acta Sanctorum in:

Volumes of the Acta Sanctorum online

  • vol 1 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum01unse  - January part 1 (Jan 1-10)
  • vol 2 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum02unse  - January part 2 (Jan 11-20)
  • vol 3 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum03unse  - January part 3 (Jan 21-30)
  • vol 4 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum04unse  - February part 1 (Feb 1-6)
  • vol 5 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum05unse  - February part 2 (Feb 7-17)
  • vol 6 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum06unse  - February part 3 (Feb 17-end)
  • vol 7 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum07unse  - March part 1 (Mar 1-8)
  • vol 8 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum08unse  - March part 2 (Mar 9-19)
  • vol 9 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum09unse  - March part 3 (Mar 19-end
  • vol 10 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum10unse  - April part 1 (Apr 1-10)
  • vol 11 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum11unse  - April part 2 (Apr 11-21)
  • vol 12 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum12unse  - April part 3 (Apr 21-end)
  • vol 13 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum13unse  - May propylaeum
  • vol 14 - Acta Sanctorum 05 Maii Tomus 01 1680 - May part 1 (May 1-4)
  • vol 15 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum15unse  - May part 2 (May 5-11)
  • vol 16 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum16unse  - May part 3 (May 12-16)
  • vol 17 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum17unse  - May part 4 (May 17-19)
  • vol 18 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum18unse  - May part 5 (May 20-24)
  • vol 19 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum19unse  - May part 6 (May 25-28)
  • vol 20 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum20unse  - May part 7 (May 29-end)
  • vol 21 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum21unse  - June part 1 (Jun 1-6)
  • vol 22 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum22unse  - June part 2 (Jun 7-11)
  • vol 23 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum23unse  - June part 3 (Jun 12-15)
  • vol 24 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum24unse  - June part 4 (Jun 16-20)
  • vol 25 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum25unse  - June part 5 (Jun 20-24)
  • vol 26 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum26unse  - June part 6
  • vol 27 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum27unse  - June part 7 (Jun 25-end) Chronology of the patriarchs of Alexandria.
  • vol 28 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum28unse  - July part 1 (Jul 1-3)
  • vol 29 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum29unse  - July part 2 (Jul 4-9)
  • vol 30 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum30unse  - July part 3 (Jul 10-14)
  • vol 31 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum31unse  - July part 4 (Jul 15-19)
  • vol 32 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum32unse  - July part 5 (Jul 20-24)
  • vol 33 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum33unse  - July part 6 (Jul 25-28)
  • vol 34 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum34unse  - July part 7 (Jul 29-31)
  • vol 35 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum35unse  - August part 1 (Aug 1-4)

  • vol 39 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum39unse  - August part 5 (Aug 25-26)
  • vol 40 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum40unse  - August part 6 (Aug 27-end plus supplement)
  • vol 41 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum41unse  - September part 1 (Sep 1-3)
  • vol 42 – http://archive.org/details/actasanctorum42unse  - September part 2 (Sep 4-6)

  • vol 51 – http://books.google.co.uk/books?id=kc5SCeuNHx4C  - October part 3 (Oct 5-7)
  • vol 52 - Acta Sanctorum 10 Octobris Tomus 04 1780 - October part 4 (Oct 8-9)
  • vol 53 – http://books.google.co.uk/books?id=AmzrqEh-C-0C  - October part 5 (Oct 10-11)

  • vol 55 – http://books.google.co.uk/books?id=49c-AAAAcAAJ  - October part 7 (Oct 15-16) + Acta Sanctorum 10 Octobris Tomus 07 Suppl 1854
  • vol 56 - Acta Sanctorum 10 Octobris Tomus 08 1853 - October part  8 (Oct 17-20)
  • vol 57 – http://books.google.co.uk/books?id=yNY-AAAAcAAJ  - October part 9 (Oct 21-22)
  • vol 58 – http://books.google.co.uk/books?id=D9c-AAAAcAAJ  - October part 10 (Oct 23-24)

  • vol 61 - Acta Sanctorum 10 Octobris Tomus 13 1883 - October part 13 (Oct 30-end)
